$:/xp/magicSidebar/readme.title: $:/xp/magicSidebar/readme
$:/xp/magicSidebar/readme.text:
\define dropdown-sidebar-animation() <$select tiddler="$:/xp/magicSidebar/Stylesheet" field="animation"> \end 当侧边栏处于隐藏状态时，您可以将鼠标指针移到右侧热点区以显示侧边栏。 : <$checkbox tiddler="$:/xp/magicSidebar/Stylesheet" field="display" checked="inline-block" unchecked="none" default="inline-block"> [[Turn on magicSidebar|$:/xp/magicSidebar]]
设置热区宽度和高度： |''Width''|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/xp/magicSidebar/Stylesheet" field="width" default="" tag="input" size=4/> | |''Height''|^<$edit-text tiddler="$:/xp/magicSidebar/Stylesheet" field="height" default="" tag="input" size=4/> | 设置显示动画：<>
See also: [[Whitespace Theme|http://j.d.whitespace.tiddlyspot.com/]]

$:/xp/magicSidebar/template.title: $:/xp/magicSidebar/template
$:/xp/magicSidebar/template.text:
\whitespace trim \define config-title() $:/config/SideBarSegments/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end <$list filter="[[$:/state/sidebar]get[text]] +[else[yes]match[no]]" variable="ignore"> <$scrollable fallthrough="no" class='magic-sidebar'>
<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="nomatch" text="yes" default="yes" retain="yes" animate="yes"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SideBarSegment]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" tag="div"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="block"/>
